title: The Black Company
description: Duration: 10 hours 54 minsSome feel the Lady, newly risen from centuries in thrall, stands between humankind and evil. Some feel she is evil itself. The hardbitten men of the Black Company take their pay and do what they must, burying their doubts with their dead - until the prophesy: The White Rose has been reborn, somewhere, to embody good once more.There must be a way for the Black Company to find her....
author: Glen Cook
